nodes.text: "The Hero's Journey Begins" is a short story written by Trey King that was published in the anthologies Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1 and The Original Trilogy Stories. It adapts Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope from Luke Skywalker and Owen Lars buying the droids to Luke deciding to accompany Obi-Wan Kenobi to Alderaan.
